alert.note: Alert for Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Inland Valleys; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 26 at 9:17PM PDT until March 27 at 2:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with local gusts to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire, San Diego County Valleys, Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills and Orange County Inland Areas. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 2 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Inland Valleys; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills
